Resources
====================


Resources to Use
----------------

* `C++ Reference <https://cppreference.com>`_ A great general reference; light on coding samples.
* `CPlusPlus <cplusplus.com>`_ -- A bit older but with tutorials and reference.
* `C++ FAQ <https://isocpp.org/faq>`_ - ISO CPP's super-FAQ. 

C++ 20 Resources
----------------
* Marc Gregoire has a talk on `C++ 20 features <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FRkJCvHWdwQ>`_.
* Gregoire also authored `Professional C++ <https://www.amazon.com/Professional-C-Marc-Gregoire/dp/1119695406/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3R8DGYUWMSVHT&keywords=Professional+C%2B%2B&qid=1695737723&sprefix=professional+c%2B%2B%2Caps%2C70&sr=8-1>`_.
* For a deep dive on ranges, see `C++20 Ranges in Practice <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d_E-VLyUnzc>`_.
